SCOURGE is still facing down the seem=
ingly evil version of RODIMUS,
his 10+ frame seeming to tower over their 7+=

. Our orders come from Cyclonus and Hydras himself.=94

said, send your flunkies =

you the best of friends?=94 H=
is tone was openly mocking now.

SCOURGE snarled, =93And you are a fool com=
ing back here like you can
just come back when you are ready.=94

The sweep=
s aim their weapons at DARK RODIMUS, =93You can come the easy
way or the ha=
rd way.=94 SCOURGE smiled wickedly, =93I am personally hoping
for the hard =
way myself.=94 The other sweeps smiled too as they began to
approach DARK R=
ODIMUS like wolves surrounding their prey, cornering
it.

mer.
